tool_description:
Screen Shot Website in Real Time.

Feel free to drop me a message.
name: Snappy: Web Capture
title: Snappy: Web Capture

api_list.name: snap
api_list.description:
Simply input url of the webpage that you wish to screenshot.
API returns a temporary link (valid for 1 hour) to download the screenshot.
Alternatively, you can also choose to have the image returned in base64 encoding.

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Number of seconds to wait before loading the webpage.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Return image in either png or jpeg format.

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description:
Height of the screenshot. Larger height value can capture webpages with longer content.
Up to value of 10000.

optional_parameters.name: hide_scroll_bar
optional_parameters.description: Choose True to hide browser scroll bar.

optional_parameters.name: exclude_base64
optional_parameters.description: If False, API will return image in base64 encoding.

optional_parameters.name: wait
optional_parameters.description:
Number of seconds to wait for the webpage to load before taking a screenshot.
Set this to larger number if the webpage is content heavy or you are taking a webpage with large height.
